name: Blazing Escape Trijam
description:
Trijam #77 submission. Made in 2h 54m 48s

In this platformer player takes control of blazing fireball in iceworld.

Fireball uses it's core's fuel to jump and restores it while  resting on platform.

Every platform will be melted by fireball upon contact, so don't be to relaxet resting on them.

Controls:
Jump : W , Z , Arrow Up , Space , D-Pad UP , Left Stick Up  , Dualshock Cross / Xbox A  / Nintendo  B
Left: Arrow Left, A, Q, D-Pad Left, Left Stick Left
Right: Arrow Right, D, D-Pad Right Left Stick Right

Have a nice day!
